definition: to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: Meanwhile, there are more than 70 Chinese-funded businesses in Brazil and 300 Brazilian-funded businesses in China.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国在巴西投资兴建了70多家企业。

sentences.english: The current galvanizing mill will be removed and the six-high mill will be built in its place.
sentences.chinese: 目前镀锌厂将被删除，将在其位置上兴建的六辊轧机。

sentences.english: The constructuion of Hetula city was the necessity of Nuerhachi s force development.
sentences.chinese: 赫图阿拉城的兴建，是努尔哈赤势力发展的必然要求。

sentences.english: We have good service in our park and a four star-rated hotel is being set up.
sentences.chinese: 园区接待环境良好，正在兴建1座四星级酒店。

sentences.english: The Wan-An Lock is a huge single-step ship lock with the highest water head in our country.
sentences.chinese: 万安船闸是国内目前兴建的最高水头的单级大型船闸。

sentences.english: The region is rich in geothermal water resources, the construction of the trench Shentang Resort.
sentences.chinese: 区内地热水资源十分丰富，兴建了神堂沟渡假村。

sentences.english: The Lai King Hospital was being built.
You have to Think Big, Build Small.
sentences.chinese: 你必须高瞻远瞩，兴建小型。

sentences.english: The approval letter issued by Lands Department for construction of village house in south Lantau.
sentences.chinese: 地政总署批准在南大屿山兴建村屋之批准书。

sentences.english: We must buckle down ourselves until we complete the tower.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须全力以赴直到我们完成了这座塔的兴建。

sentences.english: China said it will continue with plans to build about twenty-five new nuclear reactors.
sentences.chinese: 中国表示将继续与计划兴建约二五新的核反应堆。

sentences.english: For these reasons I would support the building of a movie theater in my neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 基于这些理由，我赞成在我的住家附近兴建电影院。

sentences.english: Death toll rises to 6 in workshop collapse.
sentences.chinese: 江苏南通兴建厂房倒塌，死亡人数上升至6人。

sentences.english: Sunny Bay Salt Water Pumping Station under construction.
sentences.chinese: 兴建中的欣澳咸水抽水站。

sentences.english: I not only opposed the construction of Zipingpu, but also the overdevelopment of the reservoirs on Minjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 我不仅反对兴建紫坪铺，而且过度的水库岷江。

sentences.english: The Bluenose built in Lunenburg is world famous.
sentences.chinese: 在卢嫩堡兴建的布卢诺斯是世界闻名。

definition: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to carry out large scale construction
Xinjian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
